context.content: "Psycho (1960)" is a psychological horror film directed by Alfred Hitchcock. The plot revolves around a secretary who embezzles money and goes on the run, eventually arriving at a secluded motel run by a disturbed proprietor. The main themes include identity, obsession, and the nature of evil.

Wow, "Psycho (1960)" sounds really intriguing! I love the idea of a psychological thriller with elements of horror and mystery. I think I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
